description: Low‑level 5V 8‑channel relay interface board with opto‑isolated inputs. Each channel requires 15‑20mA driver current and drives high‑current relays rated for AC250V/10A or DC30V/10A. The module is compatible with Arduino and other microcontrollers, featuring SPDT low‑noise relays, opto‑coupler isolation, and a standard 5V logic interface.
application_examples: Control household appliances or industrial equipment with high current loads
Arduino or Raspberry Pi projects requiring isolated relay control
Switching AC or DC loads up to 250V/10A or 30V/10A

special_features: Common, Normally Open, Normally Closed contacts
Separate JD‑VCC for relay coil power

power_pins.JD-VCC: Relay coil supply (5V, optional separate supply)

getting_started.connection_guide: Connect VCC to 5V, GND to ground, IN1‑IN8 to microcontroller digital pins. For full isolation, supply JD‑VCC from a separate 5V source and leave the VCC‑JD‑VCC jumper removed.

source_document: User Guide for 8 Channel 5V Optical Isolated Relay Module (Handson Technology)
